ygData.subject: Re: languages
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I don t agree with you my friend. I have a really good example on the PvP server (Rallos Zek). When trolls, ogres and dark elves begin a war against
ygData.messageBody:
>What is the point of wasting time and a practice point on lauguages? I'm
>getting way too much crap on languages that has no use.

I don't agree with you my friend. I have a really good example on the PvP
server (Rallos Zek). When trolls, ogres and dark elves begin a war against
Freeport, they speak Dark Speech. It can be very important to understand
them during the battle to know their plans.
But it's true that I don't have any example on other servers, except for
role play.

Erwin, Paladin of Tunare (Fennon Ro)
